content:
I am a Research Engineer at ASUS Singapore. I received both my M.S. and B.S. in Computer Science and Information Engineering from National Taiwan University, where I worked with Prof. Hsuan-Tien Lin and Prof. Kuan-Hao Huang. My research focuses on developing trustworthy NLP and multimodal models by addressing challenges in robustness and interpretability.
Reach me at: ${firstname}_${lastname}@asus.com
Education # M.S. in Computer Science and Information Engineering, National Taiwan University B.S. in Computer Science and Information Engineering, National Taiwan University Work Experience # Research Engineer, ASUS, Nov. 2023 - Present Research Intern, Chinese University of Hong Kong, Jun. 2023 - Aug. 2023 Machine Learning Engineer Intern, Jubo Health, Jul. 2022 - Sep. 2022 Professional Services # Journal reviewer: IEEE/ACM Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing
summary: I am a Research Engineer at ASUS Singapore.

content:
National Taiwan University # I am deeply passionate about teaching and sharing knowledge with others. Throughout my time at NTU, I had the opportunity to work closely with students and contribute to their learning. I served as a teaching assistant for the following courses:
CSIE5043: Machine Learning, Spring 2023 CSIE3005: Foundations of Artificial Intelligence, Spring 2022 CSIE5043: Machine Learning, Fall 2021 CSIE3110: Formal Languages and Automata Theory, Fall 2020
summary: National Taiwan University # I am deeply passionate about teaching and sharing knowledge with others.
title: Teaching
